justification: It notes B’s need for stable floors and win-now help, but overlooks key beliefs: B prefers workhorse RBs (not committee backs) and values targets/touches—Noah Brown is a high-target TE and B’s only TE. A already has a Tier 2 TE, reducing A’s urgency. The trade is feasible but mismatched to B’s conservative mindset and positional needs; acceptance probability seems overstated. Rationale is brief and generic without scenario-specific support.
